AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Young agent
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in one of the training facilities devoted to producing intelligence operatives. [PAWN_possessive] formative years were occupied with many of the usual mundane types of education, but augmented with courses on observation and combat.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mischevious
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was the classic mischevious kit. Always getting caught with [PAWN_possessive] hands in the cookie jar (literal or proverbial).

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mech engineer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a technician working on bipedal walking battlemechs in the Solaris arena. [PAWN_possessive] long hours kept [PAWN_possessive] team winning matches, and honed [PAWN_possessive] skills to a razor edge.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Machinist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked in a metal shop, working a metal milling machine, manufacturing components for various devices. [PAWN_pronoun] has a fine eye for detail, and a steady hand.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hotrod apprentice
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] worked with [PAWN_possessive] father, running an old Auto-repair shop in a dusty frontier town, restoring old wrecks into dream-machines. How [PAWN_pronoun] ended up here is a mystery...

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fruit rancher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] had fine orchards, with the juiciest Oranges around... until a strange meteorite landed square in the middle of [PAWN_possessive] land, tainting the soil. It's only a matter of time tile [PAWN_pronoun] can get on [PAWN_possessive] feet again.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Tyro
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was apprenticing under [PAWN_possessive] father, learning the family trade. [PAWN_pronoun] was an attentive student, but always longed for [PAWN_possessive] free time when HE would play with [PAWN_possessive] B-B gun in the fields near [PAWN_possessive] home.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Noble line
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is apparently descended from an ancient line of kings, or at least [PAWN_possessive] grandfather was always drumming it into [PAWN_possessive] head, along with various lessons on etiquette, protocol, and political lessons.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Young forester
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up right at the edge of a great forest. [PAWN_pronoun] spent most of [PAWN_possessive] free time playing and investigating all the fascinating plants and animals that [PAWN_pronoun] could find there.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fennex colonykid
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was born in a small trading post on the outer rims. [PAWN_pronoun] had to learn to carry [PAWN_possessive] weight and keep the colony running from an early age.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: City kid
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in one of the megalopolis centers on a dense Urbworld. After school, [PAWN_pronoun] would head off to one of the metro malls or arcades. Growing up in a concrete landscape, left [PAWN_pronoun] a bit lacking when it comes to plants and animals.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Farm kid
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] grew up in an ag region, supporting the major metropolises food supply on [PAWN_possessive] Rimworld. Living so far from other young people made social life difficult, but [PAWN_nameDef] made the best of it - though [PAWN_pronoun] ended up a bit shy.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Young genius
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] loved tinkering with [PAWN_possessive] toys, taking them apart and reassembling them - programming simple little computer programs from [PAWN_possessive] elementary school textbooks - or simply reading any piece of information [PAWN_pronoun] can get [PAWN_possessive] hands on.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Tunnel kit
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was always digging little tunnels in the dirt or snow, or making sandcastles at the beach. [PAWN_possessive] parents encouraged [PAWN_pronoun] to learn about geology, and [PAWN_possessive] father would challenge [PAWN_pronoun] to find certain kinds of rocks in the yard.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Armorer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was interested in guns and firearms of all kinds from a young age. [PAWN_possessive] interest led [PAWN_pronoun] to the military, where he was in charge of the Armory - maintiaing all the weapons and various equipment alongside the Gunsmiths.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Hooker
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a practitioner of 'the oldest profession' - walking the streets selling ass.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Deep-tunnel miner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] operated a deep-core drilling rig, sometimes miles below the surface where the stresses from pressure and heat on the machines require constant maintenance. [PAWN_pronoun] developed a strong back and keen eye for geology and metallurgy.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Biologist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a biologist. [PAWN_pronoun] has dedicated [PAWN_possessive] life to unravelling the secrets of life itself! Or just studying it, depending on your specific field!

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Restaurateur
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] owned and operated a chain of successful high-class urbworld restaurants. Unfortunately, they didn't survive the franchise wars against Taco Gong, and [PAWN_pronoun] was forced to flee the planet.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fennex hunter
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a professional hunter. Sometimes called to put down manhunters, or guide rich dentists on Safari, [PAWN_possessive] skills as a tracker are only matched by [PAWN_possessive] skill at handling.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Booze king
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was renowned for making the strongest liquors. If you wanted a drink that would put down a raging Thrumbo, [PAWN_pronoun] had the stuff. Unfortunately, a leak in a storage tank plus a small spark equals a very large explosion and 'no more distillery'. Looks like [PAWN_pronoun] is starting over...

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Trail blazer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is at the forefront of the effort to expand the territories controlled by the Alliance - rushing headlong into the unknown to colonize uncharted worlds and eke out a living.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Historical researcher
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is among the foremost historians among [PAWN_possessive] people, especially in regards to lineage and ancient heraldry. Many have sought [PAWN_possessive] services, claiming relation to some long-dead king or emperor. [PAWN_pronoun] delves through ancient texts and records in search of what truth can be found.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Frontier doctor
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has taken an oath to devote [PAWN_possessive] life to healing others. [PAWN_pronoun] has taken [PAWN_possessive] mission out to the furthest reaches and the dustiest outposts. You know... places like this...

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fennex diner-chef
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a chef in an old Retro-style diner from ancient earth history. It was a pretty popular place, the cherry-red seating and chrome hilights flash and splendor matched the fantastically prepared diner-style food [PAWN_pronoun] created every day. How did [PAWN_pronoun] end up here?

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fennex librarian
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] spent [PAWN_possessive] days sorting, stacking, and reading, books of all kinds, as a Keeper in one of the central city libraries.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Runner
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a package runner for a small delivery service. It is [PAWN_possessive] duty to deliver small items and packages, or information, wherever [PAWN_possessive] superiors order.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Tank commander
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was commanding officer of an armored assault unit. [PAWN_pronoun] has endured heavy military and tactical training, with a heavy focus on armored vehicle combat.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fennex space-trader
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a free-trader, roving the tradeways searching for deals and opportunities for profit. Until now, HE was flying a ship, making deals with colonies like these... I wonder what happened?

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fox-hound
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was one of an ultra-elite troop of soldiers, founded by the legendary "Really Big Boss".

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Fennex hitman
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a deadly assassin for profit. [PAWN_pronoun] always completes [PAWN_possessive] contracts (and always tries to look REALLY cool while doing it).

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Astryphysicist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was inspired from childhood by the stars. [PAWN_pronoun] spent many long hours gazing through [PAWN_possessive] telescope, charting the cosmos.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Paleobotanist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] has spent years studying ancient plant life, excavating and preserving ancient specimens from geological substrates, or studying samples in the lab.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Mathematician
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a professional mathematician. [PAWN_pronoun] uses [PAWN_possessive] expertise with mathematics to solve difficult engineering and physics problems.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Airfield mechanic
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a skilled mechanic, in charge of maintenance at a major airfield. [PAWN_pronoun] was hard-pressed to keep up with the workload, but [PAWN_possessive] team was competant, and helped keep the airfield and it's traffic in good working order.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Exoplanetologist
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] is a scientist specializing in studying planets that orbit a star outside the current stellar system. [PAWN_pronoun] has developed a special set of skills, software, and tools, for studying distant planets to uncover potential resources or discoveries.
